DisplayName: {ToyBox} is preparing to conquer the Imperium
Description: ToyBox (Sh0dan) is a cute and playful mod with 500+ cheats, tweaks and quality of life improvements for Rogue Trader. Warning: This is an experimental preview of ToyBox for Rogue Trader Beta. Save early and often. Note: Not all features are functional at this time. The ToyBox team is working hard to get as much working as fast as possible
Author: Narria
